item.description: Lore You nervously fidget with the wrought iron ring with your family’s crest you’re wearing, realizing how out of place it makes you feel in the mercenary company office.
UA Skill Feats 40 DND Homebrew Feats to Use - The Arcade Man
Lore In Character Out of character Feature Mechanics Skill Proficiencies Skill 1 Skill 2 Languages English Other [[Languages]] Tool Proficiencies Tools | D&D 5th Edition on Roll20 Compendium
Online Resources 5e Backgrounds - D&D Wiki This has a ton, but proceed with caution, I may veto OP ones Chef Advantage in survival situations Camp chef or similar
Lore You nervously fidget with the wrought iron ring with your family’s crest you’re wearing, realizing how out of place it makes you feel in the mercenary company office.
Lore At a certain point in your life, you were struck by the differences in the ways other people viewed and expressed their views on the world.
## Lore “To come to this place voluntarily one must be mentally deficient” - you think to yourself as you listen to the confessions of a woman who is haunted by the many she has killed.
Lore In a land of chaos, you are order. In a realm of the unknown, you enforce the known. You bring stability to the untamed, lawless frontier.
Lore The quiet life of your community suited you just fine; a modicum of peace and prosperity was had in your home, and you realize now that it was all taken for granted.

Lore Everyone makes a big fuss about how dangerous the frontier is - but to you it’s all old hat. It may be hell - but you’ve survied hell for this long, and by now you can’t imagine anything different.

Lore You sidle in to the shithole watering hole and cast an experienced casual glance around the place for lawmen. Things haven’t been easy since you’ve been on the run, but every mile further west you go you feel safer.

Lore You feel along the seam of this dimension looking for weak points. To your surprise, you find one. A small nodule in space, barely noticeable, but to someone with your training there plain as day.
